pullRequest.title: public static handling
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description of the Change
Made some changes suggested by Sonar:

made NAMED_COLOR_LIST an immutable list
made some public static fields final (if no other changes were being made to value)
changes the visibility of some public static mutable variables

Alternate Designs

Why Should This Be In Core?

Benefits

Possible Drawbacks

Verification Process

Applicable Issues

commit.message: made certain public static variables final
